item.title: Sidelined from Trump-Putin talks, Ukraine warns the world not to trust Russia
item.description: Ukraine has been left out in the cold ahead of high-profile talks between U.S. President Donald Trump and President Vladimir Putin on Friday.

item.title: Trump says he's nominating E.J. Antoni as Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner
item.description: President Trump, who claimed former BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer manipulated jobs data, said Antoni would release "honest and accurate" numbers.

item.title: Trump extends China tariff deadline by 90 days
item.description: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that will prevent U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods from spiking for another 90 days.

item.title: California Gov. Newsom warns Trump he'll retaliate if Texas GOP draws new congressional maps
item.description: Republicans have a slim majority in the House of Representatives. Texas GOP lawmakers are seeking to preserve that edge over Democrats in the 2026 ele...

item.title: Trump puts Washington, DC, police under federal control, deploys National Guard
item.description: Trump in a social media post on Sunday declared that "the Homeless" in Washington, D.C., will "have to move out."
